name: The Web Guild Limited
goal: We believe in a better code of conduct for the digital industry. We vet web companies and ask them to adhere to certain standards, we provide web professionals with the means to maintain Contined Professional Development logs, we provide training and updates on digital issues and we help educate the public / "clients" about the Internet. As we are a new organisation we are currently mainly active just in the UK but we do intend to spread our activities over the coming months.
interests: Communication, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Public Consultation on the Evaluation and Review of the ePrivacy Directive.
